text: Walter Blattmann (June 23, 1920 - April 10, 2000) was an American gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2000 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from New Orleans
title: Walter Blattmann
